attributes.action: restore Huddersfield and Kirklees roads to a satisfactory level.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The condition of roads around Huddersfield and the Kirklees Borough are at a completely unacceptable level. We know of no other destination or town as large as Huddersfield that has such poor driving surfaces. This is not only dangerous as proven by damage to wheels, tyres and suspension, but also costs the driver when replacing components that should have an operational life much greater than currently seen. 
Simply plugging pot holes with bit of Tarmac does not suffice and definitely does improve the comfort to any motor vehicle driver or passenger. 

WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO? 

This is a question that definitely needs an answer.

Please fix our roads!

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
